edu.cuny.ai.learning.MimicryLearner

Uses of MimicryLearner in edu.cuny.ai.learning
 

Classes in edu.cuny.ai.learning that implement MimicryLearner
 class AveragingLearner
          predicts with the average of inputs, weighing the inputs equally, in contrast to the discounting weights to inputs over time in WidrowHoffLearner.
 class ReverseDiscountSlidingLearner
          tracks a series of signals, whose impacts fade over time and overlap linearly.
 class SlidingWindowLearner
          maintains a sliding window over the trained data series and use the average of data items falling into the window as the output learned.
 class SortedSlidingWindowLearner
          maintains a sorted sliding window over the trained data series and use a percentage to determine a data item in the window as the output learned.
 class WidrowHoffLearner
          An implementation of the Widrow-Hoff learning algorithm for 1-dimensional training sets.
 class WidrowHoffLearnerWithMomentum
          An extension of WidrowHoffLearner that supports the discounted effect of cumulative training signal, i.e.
